articles.content:

articles.title: HIV remains a leading killer in Africa despite medical breakthroughs—how to eliminate it - Medical Xpress

articles.title: Mozambican ‘kidnapping kingpin’ is a transport businessman: lawyer - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The Mozambican man alleged to be a kidnapping kingpin is a transport businessman who has permanent residence in South Africa.
